resources.string:
• Pacman, our hero, munches his way around the room, eating all of the Pac-dots. However, life isn't easy for our young little hero.
 • Along his journey, he faces spooky ghosts who will try to harm him. Avoid them at all costs.
 • In each corner of the room there is a power pellet.
• When Pacman eats a power pellet, he is temporarily able to eat enemy ghosts.

Up: Swipe Up
 Down: Swipe Down
 Left: Swipe Left
 Right: Swipe Right
 Pause: Double Tap
